mapper.select: select t.train_id as train_id, s.seat_id as seat_id, s.seat_type as seat_type, s.seat_location as seat_location, s.seat_price as seat_price,s.seat_carriage as seat_carraige from train as t, seat as s where t.train_id = #{train_id} and t.train_id = s.train_id and s.seat_type=#{seat_type} and s.seat_id not in (select seat_id from orders where train_id = #{train_id} and train_date = #{train_date} and ((start_stop_id <= #{start_stop_id} and end_stop_id > #{start_stop_id}) or (start_stop_id > #{start_stop_id} and start_stop_id < #{end_stop_id})))
